about.title: About Us
about.desc: Practically born into the natural products industry, A. Barjawi actively seeks and responds to feedback on his thoughts about creating a new business paradigm, addressing issues facing the foods and beverages industry, exploring the international products to assist his environment to have the best quality foods and much more.
about.subd: We are Global Intergross Owned business that has been Import and Export for along generation.

orderbyemail.title: Order By Email
orderbyemail.description: Customer service advisors are also fully briefed on all Interfood products and services - with contact management software systems ensuring all information is immediately at hand.

services.description: For purchases over SEK 3,000, we offer free shipping within Malmö, we also have agreements with transport companies that deliver to the whole of Sweden and Denmark. You always get competitive prices from us.
services.description3: To ensure our customers are satisfied

stat.title: Our numbers will owe you
stat.description: The experience we have yielded throughout the years have always been the basis of this sole foundation.
